kv1.3:1.3.pli: Sabbe devā jaḷā elamūgā aviññū hatthasaṃvācikā nappaṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitānaṃ atthamaññātuṃ, sabbe devā na buddhe pasannā na dhamme pasannā na saṅghe pasannā, na buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsanti, na buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti, na buddhena bhagavatā pañhe vissajjite attamanā, sabbe devā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā assaddhā acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ, sabbe devā mātughātakā pitughātakā arahantaghātakā ruhiruppādakā saṅghabhedakā, sabbe devā pāṇātipātino adinnādāyino kāmesumicchācārino musāvādino pisuṇāvācā pharusāvācā samphappalāpino abhijjhāluno byāpannacittā micchādiṭṭhikāti?

kv1.3:2.1.pli: Nanu atthi devā ajaḷā anelamūgā viññū na hatthasaṃvācikā paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitānaṃ atthamaññātuṃ, atthi devā buddhe pasannā dhamme pasannā saṅghe pasannā, buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsanti, buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti, buddhena bhagavatā pañhe vissajjite attamanā honti, atthi devā na kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā na kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā saddhā chandikā paññavanto bhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ, atthi devā na mātughātakā na pitughātakā na arahantaghātakā na ruhiruppādakā na saṅghabhedakā, atthi devā na pāṇātipātino na adinnādāyino na kāmesumicchācārino na musāvādino na pisuṇāvācā na pharusāvācā na samphappalāpino na abhijjhāluno abyāpannacittā sammādiṭṭhikāti?

kv1.3:3.1.pli: Hañci atthi devā ajaḷā anelamūgā viññū na hatthasaṃvācikā paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitānaṃ atthamaññātuṃ …pe…

kv1.3:3.3.pli: sammādiṭṭhikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.3:4.3.pli: Atthi tattha pabbajjā muṇḍiyaṃ kāsāvadhāraṇā pattadhāraṇā, devesu sammāsambuddhā uppajjanti, paccekasambuddhā uppajjanti, sāvakayugaṃ uppajjatīti?

kv1.3:5.1.pli: Devesu pabbajjā natthīti, natthi devesu brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:5.3.pli: Yattha atthi pabbajjā tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha natthi pabbajjā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:5.5.pli: yattha atthi pabbajjā tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha natthi pabbajjā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:5.7.pli: Yo pabbajati tasseva brahmacariyavāso, yo na pabbajati natthi tassa brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:6.1.pli: Devesu muṇḍiyaṃ natthīti, natthi devesu brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:6.3.pli: Yattha atthi muṇḍiyaṃ tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha natthi muṇḍiyaṃ natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:6.5.pli: yattha atthi muṇḍiyaṃ tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha natthi muṇḍiyaṃ natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:6.7.pli: Yo muṇḍo hoti tasseva brahmacariyavāso, yo muṇḍo na hoti natthi tassa brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:7.1.pli: Devesu kāsāvadhāraṇā natthīti, natthi devesu brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:7.3.pli: Yattha atthi kāsāvadhāraṇā tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha natthi kāsāvadhāraṇā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:7.5.pli: yattha atthi kāsāvadhāraṇā tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha natthi kāsāvadhāraṇā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:7.7.pli: Yo kāsāvaṃ dhāreti tasseva brahmacariyavāso, yo kāsāvaṃ na dhāreti natthi tassa brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:8.1.pli: Devesu pattadhāraṇā natthīti, natthi devesu brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:8.3.pli: Yattha atthi pattadhāraṇā tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha natthi pattadhāraṇā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:8.5.pli: yattha atthi pattadhāraṇā tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha natthi pattadhāraṇā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:8.7.pli: Yo pattaṃ dhāreti tasseva brahmacariyavāso, yo pattaṃ na dhāreti natthi tassa brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:9.1.pli: Devesu sammāsambuddhā nuppajjantīti, natthi devesu brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:9.3.pli: Yattha sammāsambuddhā uppajjanti tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha sammāsambuddhā nuppajjanti natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:9.5.pli: yattha sammāsambuddhā uppajjanti tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha sammāsambuddhā nuppajjanti natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:9.7.pli: Lumbiniyā bhagavā jāto, bodhiyā mūle abhisambuddho, bārāṇasiyaṃ bhagavatā dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ;

kv1.3:10.1.pli: Devesu paccekasambuddhā nuppajjantīti, natthi devesu brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:10.3.pli: Yattha paccekasambuddhā uppajjanti tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha paccekasambuddhā nuppajjanti natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:10.5.pli: yattha paccekasambuddhā uppajjanti tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha paccekasambuddhā nuppajjanti natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:10.7.pli: Majjhimesu janapadesu paccekasambuddhā uppajjanti, tattheva brahmacariyavāso, natthaññatra brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:11.1.pli: Devesu sāvakayugaṃ nuppajjatīti, natthi devesu brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:11.3.pli: Yattha sāvakayugaṃ uppajjati tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha sāvakayugaṃ nuppajjati natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:11.5.pli: yattha sāvakayugaṃ uppajjati tattheva brahmacariyavāso, yattha sāvakayugaṃ nuppajjati natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:11.7.pli: Magadhesu sāvakayugaṃ uppannaṃ, tattheva brahmacariyavāso, natthaññatra brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:15.3.pli: Paccantimesu janapadesu atthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānanti?

kv1.3:16.2.pli: Atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthīti.

kv1.3:16.3.pli: Asaññasattesu devesu atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthi brahmacariyavāso, saññasattesu devesu atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthi brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:17.1.pli: Devesu atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthi brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:17.4.pli: Asaññasattesu devesu natthi brahmacariyavāso, saññasattesu devesu atthi brahmacariyavāsoti.

kv1.3:19.2.pli: Atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthīti.

kv1.3:19.3.pli: Paccantimesu janapadesu atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, majjhimesu janapadesu atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthi brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:20.1.pli: Manussesu atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthi brahmacariyavāsoti?

kv1.3:20.4.pli: Paccantimesu janapadesu natthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, majjhimesu janapadesu atthi brahmacariyavāsoti.

kv1.3:20.5.pli: Paccantimesu janapadesu natthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānanti?

kv1.3:21.3.pli: Paccantimesu janapadesu atthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānanti?

kv1.3:22.4.pli: “tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhigaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.

kv1.3:24.1.pli: Anāgāmissa puggalassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, ito cutassa tattha upapannassa kuhiṃ phaluppattīti?

kv1.3:24.3.pli: Hañci anāgāmissa puggalassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, ito cutassa tattha upapannassa tahiṃ phaluppatti;

kv1.3:25.1.pli: Anāgāmissa puggalassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, ito cutassa tattha upapannassa kuhiṃ bhāroharaṇaṃ, kuhiṃ dukkhapariññātaṃ, kuhiṃ kilesappahānaṃ, kuhiṃ nirodhasacchikiriyā, kuhiṃ akuppapaṭivedhoti?

kv1.3:25.3.pli: Hañci anāgāmissa puggalassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, ito cutassa tattha upapannassa tahiṃ akuppapaṭivedho;

kv1.3:26.1.pli: Anāgāmissa puggalassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, ito cutassa tattha upapannassa tahiṃ phaluppatti, tahiṃ bhāroharaṇaṃ, tahiṃ dukkhapariññātaṃ, tahiṃ kilesappahānaṃ, tahiṃ nirodhasacchikiriyā, tahiṃ akuppapaṭivedho;

kv1.3:26.4.pli: Handa hi anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti.

kv1.3:27.1.pli: Anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti?

kv1.3:27.3.pli: Sotāpanno puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggena idha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti?

kv1.3:28.1.pli: Anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti?

kv1.3:28.3.pli: Sakadāgāmī puggalo idha parinibbāyipuggalo tattha bhāvitena maggena idha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti?

kv1.3:29.1.pli: Sotāpanno puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena idha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti?

kv1.3:29.3.pli: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti?

kv1.3:30.1.pli: Sakadāgāmī puggalo idha parinibbāyipuggalo idha bhāvitena maggena idha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti?

kv1.3:30.3.pli: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti?

kv1.3:31.1.pli: Idha vihāya niṭṭhassa puggalassa maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti?

kv1.3:31.3.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti?

kv1.3:32.1.pli: Idha vihāya niṭṭhassa puggalassa maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti?

kv1.3:32.4.pli: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti?

kv1.3:33.1.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ maggo ca bhāvīyati, kilesā ca pahīyantīti?

kv1.3:33.3.pli: Idha vihāya niṭṭhassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ maggo ca bhāvīyati, kilesā ca pahīyantīti?

kv1.3:34.2.pli: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ maggo ca bhāvīyati, kilesā ca pahīyantīti?

kv1.3:34.4.pli: Idha vihāya niṭṭhassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ maggo ca bhāvīyati, kilesā ca pahīyantīti?

kv1.3:35.1.pli: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano tattha upapajjatīti?

kv1.3:37.3.pli: Arahā bhavena bhavaṃ gacchati, gatiyā gatiṃ gacchati, saṃsārena saṃsāraṃ gacchati, upapattiyā upapattiṃ gacchatīti?

kv1.3:38.1.pli: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano anohaṭabhāro tattha upapajjatīti?

kv1.3:39.1.pli: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano apariññātadukkho appahīnakileso asacchikatanirodho appaṭividdhākuppo tattha upapajjatīti?

kv1.3:40.1.pli: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano anohaṭabhāro tattha upapajjati, na ca bhāroharaṇāya puna maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.3:41.1.pli: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano apariññātadukkho appahīnakileso asacchikatanirodho appaṭividdhākuppo tattha upapajjati, na ca akuppapaṭivedhāya puna maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.3:41.5.pli: Yathā migo sallena viddho dūrampi gantvā kālaṃ karoti, evamevaṃ anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṃ sacchikarotīti.

kv1.3:42.1.pli: Yathā migo sallena viddho dūrampi gantvā sasallova kālaṃ karoti, evamevaṃ anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha sasallova parinibbāyatīti?

kv1.4:1.3.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?

kv1.4:1.4.pli: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ vicikicchaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:1.5.pli: Ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījī, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme …pe…

kv1.4:1.7.pli: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?

kv1.4:2.2.pli: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ jahati, vicikicchaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:2.4.pli: ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?

kv1.4:3.2.pli: Vicikicchaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:3.4.pli: ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?

kv1.4:4.3.pli: Ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījī, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme …pe…

kv1.4:4.5.pli: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?

kv1.4:5.1.pli: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?

kv1.4:5.2.pli: Oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ jahati, oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:5.3.pli: Ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv1.4:6.2.pli: Oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ jahati, oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:6.3.pli: Ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv1.4:7.2.pli: Oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ jahati, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:7.3.pli: Ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv1.4:8.2.pli: Oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ jahati, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese jahatīti.

kv1.4:8.3.pli: Ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv1.4:9.1.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?

kv1.4:9.2.pli: Aṇusahagataṃ kāmarāgaṃ jahati, aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:9.3.pli: Ekadesaṃ anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?

kv1.4:10.2.pli: Aṇusahagataṃ kāmarāgaṃ jahati, aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:10.4.pli: ekadesaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?

kv1.4:11.2.pli: Aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ jahati, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:11.4.pli: ekadesaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?

kv1.4:12.3.pli: Ekadesaṃ anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?

kv1.4:13.1.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?

kv1.4:13.2.pli: Rūparāgaṃ arūparāgaṃ mānaṃ uddhaccaṃ avijjaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:13.3.pli: Ekadesaṃ arahā, ekadesaṃ na arahā, ekadesaṃ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, (ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ) ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?

kv1.4:14.2.pli: Rūparāgaṃ arūparāgaṃ jahati, mānaṃ uddhaccaṃ avijjaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:14.4.pli: ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?

kv1.4:15.2.pli: Mānaṃ jahati, uddhaccaṃ avijjaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.

kv1.4:15.4.pli: ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?

kv1.4:16.2.pli: Uddhaccaṃ avijjaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese jahatīti.

kv1.4:16.3.pli: Ekadesaṃ arahā, ekadesaṃ na arahā, ekadesaṃ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?

kv1.4:23.4.pli: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—

kv1.4:23.5.pli: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—
